1:
Hear my prayer, Yahweh; listen to my pleas.
\q Because of your faithfulness and righteousness, answer me!
\q
2:
Do not enter into judgment with your servant,
\q for in your sight no one is righteous.
4:
My spirit is overwhelmed within me;
\q my heart despairs.
7:
Answer me quickly, Yahweh, because my spirit faints.
\q Do not hide your face from me,
\q or I will become like those who go down into the pit.
\q
8:
Let me hear your covenant faithfulness in the morning,
\q for I trust in you.
\q Show me the way where I should walk,
\q for I lift up my soul to you.
10:
Teach me to do your will,
\q for you are my God.
\q May your good Spirit
\q lead me in the land of uprightness.
12:
In your covenant faithfulness cut off my enemies
\q and destroy all the enemies of my life,
\q for I am your servant.
